result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CF599, 15CF664, 15CF675, 15CF762, 15CF903, 15CF904, 15CF905,15CF906,15CM547,  15CM602, 15CM659,15CM1798 called: 8:22am

State appears by ADA K.Mayo.  Def appears in person/in custody and with Atty Kat Jackan.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW

State files Information in 15CF904>> COURT receives; Atty Jackan acknowledges receipt; W/R.

State moves to:
15CF599 -- Ct. 2>>D&RI
15CF664 -- Cts. 2, 4, 5, and 6>>D&RI
15CF675 -- Cts. 1, 2, 4, and 5>>D&RI
15CF762>>D&RI entire file
15CF903>>D&RI entire file
15CF904 -- Cts. 2, 3, 5, and 6>>D&RI
15CF905>>D&RI entire file
15CF906>>D&RI entire file
15CM547>>D&RI entire file
15CM602>>D&RI entire file
15CM1798>>D&RI entire file
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA:
15CF599 - Ct. 1 (Poss Methamphet/Repeater)>>GUILTY
15CF599 - Ct. 3 (Misd BJ/Repeater)>>GUILTY
15CF664 - Ct. 1 (Poss Methamphet/Repeater)>>GUILTY
15CF664 - Ct. 3 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>GUILTY
15CF675 - Ct. 3 (Poss THC/Repeater)>>GUILTY
15CF904 - Ct. 1 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>GUILTY
15CF904 - Ct. 4 (Misd BJ/Rpeater)>>GUILTY
15CM659 - Ct. 1 (Retail Theft/Alter Price/Repeater)>>GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty

COURT ORDERS>>  Sentence W/held on ALL counts plead to; 5 years Probation on felony counts, 3 years Probation on misdemeanor counts, all CONCURRENT to each other
CONDITIONS of all counts: Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof; One DNA sample; CC; DNA surcharge on each count except 15CM659.
CONDITIONS in>>
15CM659>>Restitution of $38.98 for Wal-Mart
15CF904 - Ct. 1>>1 year MCJ w/huber for work/treatment/schooling/elder care (for grandmother) if defendant eligible under jail classification system - credit for time served is ordered, but counsel are to file stipulation on exact amount of credit on each count.

Attorney Jackan requests 12 hour furlough for purposes of defendant moving - State objects; COURT awards defendant 8 hours of huber if defendant eligible under jail classification system, between now and this Saturday for only purpose of moving belongings out of residence.

Any bond posted in cash to apply to restitution and then CC thereafter.

Adj: 8:44am

Final pre-trial at 12-01-2015 08:45 am.
Jury trial - 12 person at 12-15-2015 09:00 am.
